name: tactica-example
description: Example project demonstrating tactica usage with mnemonica

scripts.run:all: node build/src/index.js && node build/src/config-options.js && node build/src/decorators.js && node build/src/models.js && node build/src/services.js && node build/src/typeomatica-integration.js && node build/src/example-import.js && node build/src/example-global.js && node build/src/example-reference.js && node build/src/example-exclude.js
scripts.use:public: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8'));p.dependencies.mnemonica='latest';p.dependencies.typeomatica='latest';p.devDependencies['@mnemonica/tactica']='latest';fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,'\t')+'\n');console.log('Switched to PUBLIC npm dependencies (latest)');" && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
